#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	while(t--) {
		int n, m, s, p, q;
		cin >> n >> m >> s >> p >> q;
		vector<int>a(s + 1);
		vector<int>b(s + 1);
		int posa = 1;
		int posb = 1;
		int cycle = n - m + 1;
		for(int i = 1; i <= s; i++) {
			posa = posa + p;
			posb = posb + q;
			if(posa > m) {
				posa = posa - (m);
				posa = posa % cycle;
				posa = posa + (m);
			}
			if(posb > m) {
				posb = posb - (m );
				posb = posb % cycle;
				posb = posb + (m);
			}
			a[i] = posa;
			b[i] = posb;
		}
		int ans = 0;
		for(int i = 1; i <= s; i++) {
			if(a[i] == b[i]) {
				ans++;
			}
		}
		printf("%d\n", ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
